category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: ARM_save_bomview
preference.preference_description: Activates the save BOM view performance transaction. This measures the elapsed time between the beginning of the operation and the completion of the save operation. Valid Values: * ON: Enables performance monitoring of the save BOM view performance transaction. * OFF: Suppresses performance monitoring of the save BOM view performance transaction.
